fn.p: The authors declare no competing financial interests.

Author Contributions X.L., X.X. designed and performed the experiments. Z. Zha., Y.M., and J.Q. performed the yeast-two hybrid screen and participated in the generation of knockout cell line. C.W. performed the size-exclusion chromatography, X.Y. performed the confocal microscopy. X.L., Z. Zho., B.H., and J.W. provided finding, designed the experiments and discussed the results. X.L., B.H. and J.W. wrote the manuscript. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
